ok ill help you out on this but this is what i did.

1.) Look for pcPoints in player.java and playersave.java
2.) Open both of them and minimize one of them. (Saves Time)
3.) Now Search For pcPoints and you should get
player.java

	pcPoints = 0,

or

playersave.java

[code] } else if (token.equals("pc-points")) { p.pcPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code]

2nd time search

characterfile.write("pc-points = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.pcPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.pcPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

4.) Copy and paste under these and edit them. (SINCE IN THE PI THAT IM USING, YOU SHOULD NOT USE pkPoints I USED killPoints.)

Should look like this.

player.java

pcPoints = 0, killPoints = 0,

playersave.java

[code] } else if (token.equals("killPoints")) { p.killPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code]

2nd time search

characterfile.write("killPoints = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.killPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.killPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

NOW FOR THE LAST THING

I Edited Your public void applydead

[code] public void applyDead() { c.respawnTimer = 15; c.isDead = false; 
	if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
		//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
		c.killerId = findKiller();
		Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
		if(o != null) {
			if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
				o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+c.playerName+"!");
                                                                                                o.killPoints += 1;
			if(o.duelStatus == 5) {
				o.duelStatus++;
			}
		}
